arts.ttl: Norwich 4 Watford 1 - how the game unfolded
arts.sum: The minute-by-minute report as Watford are soundly beaten by the Canaries.

arts.ttl: Paddy's Pointers: Four observations after Norwich's emphatic Watford win
arts.sum: Paddy Davitt delivers his Watford verdict after Norwich City’s first Championship home win under Johannes Hoff Thorup.

arts.ttl: Norwich strike four to ease past Watford
arts.sum: Norwich comfortably saw off Watford 4-1 in an entertaining clash at Carrow Road to record only their second Championship win of the season.

arts.ttl: Norwich claim maiden home league win in style against Watford
arts.sum: Callum Doyle and Ben Chrisene netted their first goals for the club.

arts.ttl: Robin Sainty: 'Big issue is how to get a decent supply line to Josh Sargent'
arts.sum: In football it’s not how much possession you have, it’s what you do with it that really matters, and at Swansea City didn’t do enough, says Canaries columnist Robin Sainty.

arts.ttl: 'We need to follow his way' - Sissoko on Tom Cleverley
arts.sum: They played together, remained friends and now the French midfielder is the Hornets head coach's team captain and leader.

arts.ttl: 'Norwich is a special club' - How three ex-Canaries led Bromby to Watford
arts.sum: When searching for connections between Norwich City and Watford, there are few better to ask than Leigh Bromby.

arts.ttl: Vata starts: Watford team news and predicted XI to face Norwich City
arts.sum: The latest Watford team news as Tom Cleverley's side gear up to face Norwich City in the Championship. The post Vata starts: Watford team news and predicted XI to face Norwich City appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
Aaron Ashley has taken a look at all of this weekend's Championship matches and provided a score prediction for each game.

arts.ttl: FA hand Watford £5k fine but Sheff Utd receive £17k sanction
arts.sum: The home side's sanctions from the FA were higher as they have been guilty of the same offence four times in the last five seasons.
